00045 #pragma once
00046 #ifndef AI_VECTOR3D_H_INC
00047 #define AI_VECTOR3D_H_INC
00048 
00049 #ifdef __cplusplus
00050 #   include <cmath>
00051 #else
00052 #   include <math.h>
00053 #endif
00054 
00055 #include "defs.h"
00056 
00057 #ifdef __cplusplus
00058 
00059 template<typename TReal> class aiMatrix3x3t;
00060 template<typename TReal> class aiMatrix4x4t;
00061 
00062 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 template <typename TReal>
00065 class aiVector3t
00066 {
00067 public:
00068     aiVector3t() : x(), y(), z() {}
00069     aiVector3t(TReal _x, TReal _y, TReal _z) : x(_x), y(_y), z(_z) {}
00070     explicit aiVector3t (TReal _xyz ) : x(_xyz), y(_xyz), z(_xyz) {}
00071     aiVector3t( const aiVector3t& o ) : x(o.x), y(o.y), z(o.z) {}
00072 
00073 public:
00074 
00075     // combined operators
00076     const aiVector3t& operator += (const aiVector3t& o);
00077     const aiVector3t& operator -= (const aiVector3t& o);
00078     const aiVector3t& operator *= (TReal f);
00079     const aiVector3t& operator /= (TReal f);
00080 
00081     // transform vector by matrix
00082     aiVector3t& operator *= (const aiMatrix3x3t<TReal>& mat);
00083     aiVector3t& operator *= (const aiMatrix4x4t<TReal>& mat);
00084 
00085     // access a single element
00086     TReal operator[](unsigned int i) const;
00087     TReal& operator[](unsigned int i);
00088 
00089     // comparison
00090     bool operator== (const aiVector3t& other) const;
00091     bool operator!= (const aiVector3t& other) const;
00092     bool operator < (const aiVector3t& other) const;
00093 
00094     bool Equal(const aiVector3t& other, TReal epsilon = 1e-6) const;
00095 
00096     template <typename TOther>
00097     operator aiVector3t<TOther> () const;
00098 
00099 public:
00104     void Set( TReal pX, TReal pY, TReal pZ);
00105 
00108     TReal SquareLength() const;
00109 
00112     TReal Length() const;
00113 
00114 
00116     aiVector3t& Normalize();
00117 
00119     aiVector3t& NormalizeSafe();
00120 
00125     const aiVector3t SymMul(const aiVector3t& o);
00126 
00127     TReal x, y, z;
00128 };
00129 
00130 
00131 typedef aiVector3t<ai_real> aiVector3D;
00132 
00133 #else
